data.actual_result: Loading animation appears, even though you have nothing to scroll down on.
data.expected_result: Nothing, as you have reached the end of the log.
data.short_description: loading animation pops up when you attempt to scroll down from audit log filter that doesn't even fit one screen length.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to audit log, and select a action filter without much logs. Make sure the entire logging for the action you chose fits in 1 screen. - Attempt to scroll down.
